1111111.content:
"Well, if it made you really happy then it wasn't so bad." Naruto said, taking Sakura's bait.

"I'm glad you didn't mind it." Sakura smiled. "So can I count on having you wash and massage my feet daily?"

"What? I..."

"That would make me so happy Naruto." Sakura cut Naruto off with a sweet smile.

"Well... if it makes you happy then I can I guess." Naruto sighed.

"Great!" Sakura happily smiled. "Then from now on you are my personal foot cleaner and rubber! To make your job easier, I'll make sure to have you wash and rub my feet multiple times a day. That way they never get too dirty!"

"Sure Sakura..." Naruto really didn't like the sound of this, but he DID like being the one to make Sakura happy.

"Well if that will be all..."

"Actually Naruto, I was wondering if you could do a few more things for me. It would make my night if you can."

"What kinds of things?" Naruto warily asked.

"Things that will make me very happy." Sakura flashed Naruto a dazzling smile that set his heart aflutter.

Naruto mentally sighed. He couldn't say no to that smile, especially when he could make Sakura even more happy.

"As long as it's nothing too crazy, sure. What do you need Sakura-chan?"

"Oh you know..." Sakura said with a happy, yet victorious look on her face. Judging by that look Naruto realized that he had fallen straight into Sakura's trap and she knew it just as well as he did.
1111111.title: Naruto Easily Falls into Sakura's Trap

choices: Sakura asks Naruto lick her feet
Sakura asks Naruto to be her footrest while she finishes her book
11111111.content:
"Nothing too bad. I just want to know how my feet smell. You did just wash them after all, so they shouldn't smell bad." Sakura smiled innocently.

"Fine." Naruto sighed. He took a deep whiff of Sakura's feet and was damn grateful he had just washed them. They still didn't smell like roses, because they WERE still feet, but they smelled much better than they had originally did. "They smell fine Sakura."

"I don't know... you just took one quick sniff... it would make me feel a lot better if you just sniffed them until I tell you to stop. I know how long it would take you to adequately judge how they really smell after all." Sakura said with an innocent smile on her face.

"Sakura..."

"Please Naruto? It would make me so happy that you care about me so much you're willing to sniff my feet for me so I can know if they smell good or not." Sakura pleaded with a pout. Naruto sighed, he could never say no to that pout.

"Ok, fine." Naruto stuck his face back in Sakura's feet and began sniffing.

"Good boy." Sakura smiled. "I'm so lucky to have such a caring friend."

Naruto knew that Sakura was just buttering him up so he would do more things for her... But he couldn't help but smile when she called herself lucky to be his friend. He sniffed her feet with a little more vigor as a result.

"Oooh, that's good Naruto. Keep sniffing hard like that." Sakura grinned. "That will definitely help you to really figure out if my feet smell good or not."

Naruto obeyed Sakura without saying another word and took powerful sniff after powerful sniff of her dainty feet.

"Hey Naruto, I have some reading I need to get done. So if you could, please stay as quiet as you can and keep sniffing until I tell you to stop. I have a hard time focusing on my books when it's really loud."

"Ok Sakura." Naruto said. "How long will it take?"

"Oh it will take a while." Sakura grinned. "But I'm going to be so happy when it's done. You're the best Naruto! Now quiet down so I can read."

Naruto said nothing, but smiled when Sakura told him he was the best. He knew she was still buttering him up, but he couldn't help but eat it up. He liked being told he was the best by her...

He quietly sniffed Sakura's feet for the next two hours while she completely ignored him in favor of her book. Finally though, she snapped her book shut and looked down at him with a smug grin when she realized he was still sniffing her feet as commanded.

"Good boy Naruto. I'm impressed you were able to stay quiet so long. You have now sniffed my feet enough to be able to adequately tell me if they smell bad or not."

"They smell great Sakura." Naruto lied, wanting to make her happy.

"I'm so relieved!" Sakura grinned. "Thanks for doing that Naruto."

"No problem Sakura. But it's getting late, I think I'm going to go home and go to bed now."

"Wait! I don't you to go home yet. We're having so much fun together tonight." Sakura pouted. "Please stay?"

"It's late..."

"We never get to spend so much time together Naruto... come on, when will we get the opportunity to hang out with each other for so long again? I want to spend more time with my best friend!"

"Fine Sakura. I'll stay." Naruto said with a smile, again easily letting Sakura butter him up.

"Yay! You make me so happy Naruto."

"I'm glad Sakura."

"Would you like to make me even happier?"

"Depends..." Naruto said in a wary tone. Normally he would've said yes, but after today, he was going to be a little more careful. He did not want to blindly agree to anything involving her feet...

choices: Sakura makes Naruto sleep at her feet
1111111121.content:
Who was Naruto kidding... He couldn't turn this opportunity down! This was Sakura for freaking sake! Sakura - the beautiful pink-haired goddess he had been chasing after all his life was actually inviting him to stay the night at her house! The risk that this was a trap was well worth it to actually stay the night at her house.

"Thanks for the offer Sakura, if you really wouldn't mind me staying here..."

"That would make me happiest." Sakura smiled sweetly at him. "I would worry about you if you went home at this hour really."

Naruto perked up. Sakura would actually worry about him? That made him feel pretty good.

"Well alright then. I guess I'll sleep out here then."

"No no! The couch is uncomfortable. You can sleep in my bed with me. I'm sure we can find some position that wouldn't be inappropriate!"

"O-ok Sakura-chan. Thanks."

"No problem!" Sakura swung her feet off Naruto's face and stood up. "I'm going to go get ready for bed."

Naruto watched Sakura walk out of her living room in a slight state of shock. He couldn't believe this was actually happening!

"Oh jeez! Naruto, could you come in here please? I need your help!"

"Of course!" Naruto quickly ran into Sakura's bathroom to find her sitting on her bathroom's counter top.

"The tile is too cold for my feet! Would you mind laying down and being my mat so I can get ready for bed? You're much warmer than this cold tile."

"Uh..."

"Please Naruto? You've been so great tonight, and this would really be the cherry on top."

"Well... I guess I can for you Sakura-chan. This tile is pretty cold..."

"Perfect! Hurry up! Lay under my feet."

Naruto quickly laid down beneath Sakura's swinging feet. The sooner he got this over with, the sooner he would get to sleep in the same bed as Sakura.

Sakura flashed Naruto one more sweet smile and jumped down onto Naruto's chest, driving the air out of him.

"That's much better! Thanks Naruto. You're a wonderful bathroom mat." Sakura walked up his body and stood on his face. Once his face was obscured by her feet, Sakura allowed herself to smirk at her reflection in the mirror. This was soooooo easy.

Sakura took her sweet time getting ready for bed. She brushed her teeth for far longer than needed, and she slowly flossed between each and every tooth. Next, she took her time in slowly taking her makeup off, before finally just staring at herself for a couple of minutes in the mirror while she slightly bounced on Naruto's face.

Sakura leaped back up onto the counter once she was down and had to hold back a laugh at the embarrassed look on Naruto's face.

"Thanks so much Naruto! Now would you mind taking me to my room?"

"Of course Sakura-chan!" Naruto started to get up, but Sakura's foot pressed against his back as he went to stand, forcing him down on all fours. Before he could ask what she was doing, Sakura stepped onto his back.

"You're so sweet Naruto." Sakura cooed.

Naruto sighed, but he was going to get to sleep in the same bed as Sakura soon...

She had already made him into a pathetic submissive little bitch through fear alone, and if she beat him any further today she could do permanent damage to her slave. She was still extremely upset about what happened with her mom, and she definitely wanted to take more of her frustrations out... But giving Naruto a permanent injury wouldn't help anything, he wouldn't be able to serve her as well after all.

"Keep kissing like the little ass kisser you are slave." Sakura commanded. "If you kiss it well enough, I just might let you escape without being beaten by your mistresses any further tonight. That would be pretty nice of me, wouldn't it?"

"Y-yes Mistress." Naruto fearfully stammered out. He pressed his face even tighter against Sakura's ass and started pressing desperate kisses against it.

"That's a good little ass-kissing bitch." Sakura mocked. "You're lucky to be my slave. You're much better at worshiping feet and kissing ass than you ever would have been as Hokage."

Naruto's heart dropped. Sakura's little reminder that she had forcibly stripped his dream away from him did nothing to lift his spirits. He kissed her ass for another six minutes before her smug voice broke the silence.

"I suppose that will do slave. You will receive no beating tonight."

Naruto sighed in relief, but didn't dare move his face from Sakura's butt without her command. Instead, he kissed her ass in gratitude, praying that his submissive display would further appease his Goddess.

"Now while you were kissing my ass, my food got cold. Fix it." Sakura ordered.

Naruto stood up and used a quick jutsu to reheat Sakura's food; it was one he personally developed for long missions. He never thought he would be using it in Konoha's walls. Sakura sat down at the table and Naruto presented her with her meal and poured a glass of lemonade.

"Goddess... I just want you to know that I'm really sorry about what happened with your mom. I'll think of a way to fix it for you, I promise." Naruto quietly said. Even though he was completely miserable and terrified of Sakura, he still didn't want any child to be estranged from their parents. He knew how lonely life was without parents, and he didn't want anyone to have to go through that if they didn't have to... Even if that someone was a former friend who had stripped his dream from him and beat him into submission...

"You're souring my mood by reminding me of that slave." Sakura growled.

"I'm sorry... I just know how much life sucks without parents. I would never want anyone to have to experience that if they didn't have to."

"God you're pathetic." Sakura smirked as she started eating her dinner. "I beat the shit out of you, stripped you of your dream and turned you into my submissive little bitch... and still you would want to help me? You truly were born to be my slave.
